title: cultural_data_Douro_Museum
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.realizasom.museudodouro.
Application Name: Douro Museum.
Number of Reviews: 5.00.
Application Description: The application of the Douro Museum offers users a visit to the most significant pieces and the most interesting spaces of the museumAudio versions available in Portuguese, English, French, Spanish and German as well as videos in Portuguese sign language and international sign language.- 27 minutes of audio in English or 30 minutes of videos in International Sign Language;- Audio complemented with sound or soundscape music;- Access to points of interest through a list divided by floors;- Numeric access to points of interest;- Possibility of sequential access;- Textual information about parts and spaces;- Quiz with several questions;- Additional information about the Museum and its contacts;- Selection of favorite points;- Sharing of Museum images in social networks.Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 793.00.
Overall Rate: 4.20.
First Page Reviews: Can't install the app on my Samsung. Programme goes through endless loops, promising to install the app, but failing to do so..
